```{r}
library(BasketballAnalyzeR)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
##teams abreviations that we are examining
selTeams <- which(Tadd$team %in% c('MIN', 'BOS', 'DEN', 'MIL'))
##four factors data of just the teams
sel.FF <- fourfactors(Obox[selTeams, ], Tbox[selTeams, ])
##radial chart of each team's four factors
X <- sel.FF %>% 
  select(-c(Team, POSS.Off, POSS.Def, PACE.Off, PACE.Def, ORtg, DRtg))
radialprofile(data = X, title = sel.FF$Team)
```
